doc:
Derek Royle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derek_Royle 0 Derek Royle (7 September 1928 – 23 January 1990) was a British actor born in London, England. His face was probably better known than his name to British viewers, but he acted in films and TV from the mid-1960s until his death. He had a supporting role in the Beatles' film Magical Mystery Tour in 1967, as well as a minor one with Cilla Black in the film Work Is a Four-Letter Word a year later. Most of his film appearances were in comedy films such as Don't Just Lie There, Say Something! (1973), Tiffany Jones (1973) and Confessions of a Sex Maniac (1974). Most of his_film_appearances were in comedy_films such_as Do_n't_Just_Lie There , Say Something ! (_1973_) , Tiffany_Jones_(_1973_)_and_Confessions of a_Sex_Maniac_(_1974_) .
